messages.text: Hello there! 👋 I'm your friendly AI Therapist, here to support you on your journey. Feel free to share what's on your mind, and I'll listen and respond to how you're feeling. I'm here to help. 💖

I hear you saying you're sad.  That's okay.  Can you tell me a little more about what's making you feel sad today?  There's no pressure to share anything you're not comfortable with, but whatever you can tell me will help me understand better.
i think i cant do this

I hear you saying you feel like you can't do this. That sounds really tough.  Can you tell me a little more about what "this" is?  And what makes you feel like you can't manage it right now?  It's okay to feel overwhelmed; we can explore this together.
this is getting bad i wanna end my self

My heart aches hearing that you're feeling this way.  Saying you want to end your life is incredibly serious, and I want you to know you're not alone.  This is a lot to carry, and it sounds like you're in significant pain right now.  Is there anything you'd be willing to share about what's making you feel this way?  Even small details can help.  Right now, my priority is your safety.  Would you be open to talking about some immediate steps we can take to help you feel a little safer right now?
i think i wanna kill myself

My heart goes out to you.  Hearing you say you want to kill yourself is incredibly painful for me to hear, and I want you to know I'm here for you right now.  It's okay to feel this way;  experiencing such intense sadness is incredibly difficult, and it takes immense courage to share this with someone.  Please know that you are not alone, and this feeling, though overwhelming right now, is temporary.  

I understand this is a crisis, and you need help immediately.  There are people who want to support you through this.  Would you be willing to reach out to a crisis resource right now?  They're available 24/7 and can provide immediate support and connect you with further help.

You can call or text the 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline at 988, or text HOME to 741741 to reach the Crisis Text Line.  These are free and confidential services.

Even if you feel you can't cope right now, please know there is hope, and things can and will get better with support.  Your life matters, and I truly want to help you get through this.  Let's focus on getting you the help you need right away.  Which resource feels more accessible to you at this moment?
